column1: (Issued at 07.00 a.m. on 03 September 2024, for next 24 hours)
Sea areas around the Island
Condition of Rain:
Showers or thundershowers will occur at times in the sea areas off the coast extending
from Puttalam to Matara via Colombo and Galle. Showers or thundershowers may occur at
a few places in the other sea areas around the island during the afternoon or night.
Winds:
Winds will be south-westerly in direction and wind speed will be (30-40) kmph.

Hambantota to Pottuvil.
Wind speed can increase up to 50 kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending
from Chilaw to Hambantota via Colombo and Galle.

Mannar and Puttalam and from Hambantota to Pottuvil will be rough at times.
